attributes.action: Pay vehicle tax from the date of application instead of 1st of month.
attributes.additional_details: Sign the petition to change the way you pay for your vehicle's tax and stop the Government taking money from your pocket.
attributes.background: The government currently charges for vehicle taxfrom the start of each month, if you want to tax your vehicle after that date you have to pay for a whole month, in this digital age there is no reason why vehicle tax cannot be charged from any date in the year and then expire 364 days later.
